resources.string: Normal Weight: \nTry Not To Gain More Weight

Over Weight: 
Be sure not to gain more weight.
Lose weight if you have two or more heart disease risk factors.
Ask your doctor or a registered dietitian for help.
Obese: \nYou need to lose weight. Take steps to lose 1 to 2 pounds per week.\nAsk your doctor or a registered dietitian for help
